ej,beltc001,P,cuzzp901,Called third strike Carlos Beltran ejected by HP umpire Phil Cuzzi
umpchange,4,umphome,relic901 umpchange,4,ump2b,(None) $HP umpire Danley collapsed from heat exhaustion and left; 2B umpire Reliford went behind plate and game finished with 3 umpires
2 rain delays totaling 1:36 in 1st & 3rd
ej,larut101,M,westj901,Arguing checked swing Matt Morris said someting to Joe West about the checked swing third strike on DiFelice. LaRussa came out to protect Morris and was ejected by West

$attempted squeeze play on second pitch to Clement, which he fouled off
$blown squeeze play when Clement missed the pitch
ej,larut101,M,froeb901,Balls and strikes Cardinals Manager Tony LaRussa ejected by HP umpire Bruce Froemming in 7th
$Marco Scutaro called for interference
ej,andem003,P,barrt901,Called third strike Marlon Anderson ejected by HP umpire Ted Barrett

$Foul ball hit into Reds' dugout struck B.Larson's right ear as he was leaning on the screen at the front of the dugout; cat scan on head was negative but Larson broke his left hand when he fell and will be out for remainder of season
$J.D. Drew left with tight quad
$Albert Pujols left with spasm in upper trapezoid in left shoulder
ej,aloum001,P,cuzzp901,Balls and strikes Moises Alou ejected by HP umpire Phil Cuzzi
$Williams left with tightness in back and ribs
$Gonzalez suffered separated left shoulder in collision with Womack while attempting a diving catch; Womack's knee hit Gonzalez' shoulder
$Hall fielded ball at deep short, brief bobble, then held it as runner scored
ej,sexsr001,P,timmt901,Balls and strikes Richie Sexson ejected by HP umpire Tim Timmons
